book.title: StoryLab Starter
book.description: A quick sample project to help you explore StoryLab.

parts.title: Part I
parts.notes: Organize your chapters into parts to keep the story tidy.

chapters.title: Chapter 1: Arrival
chapters.content: Welcome to your starter project. Use this space to explore the editor and make it your own.

chapters.title: Chapter 2: Next Steps
chapters.content: Try adding themes, tags, and corkboard cards to organize your ideas.

themes.name: Protagonist Arc
themes.description: Track your hero's journey and choices.

themes.name: World
themes.description: Notes about the setting and stakes.

characters.name: Alex
characters.notes: A placeholder hero for your story.

boards.name: Ideas
boards.description: Quick notes and beats to revisit.

cards.title: Opening beat
cards.summary: Set the scene and hint at the change to come.

gridCells.note: Introduce the protagonist and their goals.
Highlight the world stakes and open questions.
